resources.string: Could not publish message. Status is %s
Could not subscribe to message. Status is %s
You have to be connected to the network to enable device recognition
You didn\'t grant the camera permission. You can only use this device as remote.
The media recorder cannot be opened but is necessary for starting the video.
Connection to camera lost due to another process with hiher priority which requested the same camera.
The camera is currently in use and cannot be opened.
The system-wide limit for number of open cameras has been reached and more camera devices cannot be opened.
The camera is disabled and cannot be used.
A fatal error has been encountered while trying to open the camera device. Try again to open the camera.
A fatal error with the camera service has been encountered. Try to restart your device to solve this issue.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
